# polytomic_sproutsocial_connection (Data Source)

Sprout Social Connection

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "polytomic_sproutsocial_connection" "sproutsocial" {
  id = "aab123aa-27f3-abc1-9999-abcde123a4aa"
}
```
